ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey (story)
ygData.msgSnippet: I gues this was ment for me :) I m playing on Quellious server so unfortunately I can t play with you. I allmost newer decline an invitation so if anyone will
ygData.messageBody:
I gues this was ment for me :)
I'm playing on Quellious server so unfortunately I can't play with you. I
allmost newer decline an invitation so if anyone will ever see me give me a
/tell.

Asandir
A lvl 15 bard

p.s.

Thanks for help with soloing. I have a partner now and a better weapon so I
am doing great.

----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 7:31 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Time for another Sylly Survey


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Great Answers! Thank you for posting. I love to hear from you and from
> everyone. You may be one of the youngest but I think that _all_ bards
need
> to be young-at-heart!!
>
> Please post again and tell us about your adventures and feel free to ask
for
> tips when you get a new song. If you play on the Innoruuk server, please
> send me a /tell I would love to hunt with you some time!
>
> Your friend,
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> The Bard!
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Janko S. [mailto:janko@...]
> Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:14 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Time for another Sylly Survey
>
> From: "Janko S." <janko@...>
>
>
>
> When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:
>
> Day of the week to play: At weekends
>
> Time of day: from midnight to 6.00am
>
> Longest stretch of continuous play: 6 hours
>
> Way to have game sounds: As silent as possible (I'm
> probably one of the
> youngest players here , if I wake up my mum I have to stop
> playing :( )
>
> Distance to sit from display: Arm lenght
>
> TV show to have on: No TV
>
> Music to listen to: gothic metall
>
> Beverage (non-alcoholic): milk
>
> Beverage (alcoholic): none
>
> Health Food: none (saving money for my phone bil :) )
>
> Junk Food: donuts
>
> Clothes to wear: jeans and T-shirt
>
>
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
